ThingDef.label: evolved arm
ThingDef.description: A normal arm created by accelerated evolution. Much more efficient than a natural arm in all ways, even outstripping bionics.

ThingDef.label: evolved arm claw
ThingDef.description: An arm claw created by accelerated evolution. While worse than an normal arm at manipulation and worse than a bone sabre at combat, lives in a healthy balance between the two.

ThingDef.label: evolved arm sabre
ThingDef.description: An arm sabre created by accelerated evolution. While not great at manpulation, it serves as one of the most deadly close combat weapons known to the rim.

ThingDef.label: evolved arm mace
ThingDef.description: An arm mace created by accelerated evolution. While not great at manpulation, serves as one of the most deadly close combat weapons known to the rim.

ThingDef.label: evolved arm tentacle
ThingDef.description: An arm tentacle created by accelerated evolution. Not great at combat, but amazing at manipulating objects due to the wide range of articulation.

ThingDef.label: evolved arm shield
ThingDef.description: An arm shield created by accelerated evolution. Not really usable for anything other than blocking damage, but grants its user a massive boost in defensive capabilities.
